title: Triumph Bar 75% Dark Chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: To triumph during this historic sporting event, our Paris Manufacture transforms the Iron Lady into chocolate for victory! To help her cross the finish line, the 75% dark chocolate Triumph Bar is adorned with french hazelnuts and almonds, carefully selected by our chef. Whether as a gift or a treat for yourself, this crunchy, delicious recipe promises an exquisite tasting experience! Taste this ode to French know-how that crowns the efforts of our craftsmen.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Ecuador National Arriba 85% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: With a 5,000-year-old genetic lineage, Ecuador’s famous heirloom cocoa - Nacional - from the Finca Garyth farm embodies centuries of cocoa tradition. A true single-origin “grand cru”, it is a complex blend of wild tropical flavours, fresh almonds, a vegetal undertone and banana in the finish. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Dark Chocolate Bar Madagascar Mivoatra 85% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Cru d'Exception among our range of chocolate bars, this chocolate from Madagascar presents strong and musky flavours. Raw and acidulous notes emerge during tasting. From the cocoa bean to the chocolate bar, including roasting and conching, all the production stages are carried out in our factory. With a range of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

title: Dark Chocolate Bar Tanzania 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Cru d'Exception among our range of chocolate bars, this chocolate from Tanzania presents bright and fruity notes. Notes of citrus, acidulous and fresh, emerge during tasting. From the cocoa bean to the chocolate bar, including roasting and conching, all the production stages are carried out in our factory. With a range of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Vietnam 75% | Le Chocolate Alain Ducasse
description: A rugged and slightly acidic dark chocolate, made with beans originating from Vietnam, Asia The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Philippines Trinitario 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Grown in the tropical region of Davao, at Paquibato in Southeastern Philippines, this cocoa is a balanced blend of fruity and sour notes. A true single-origin "grand cru", it gathers the flavors of tropical fruits, berries, citrus and of roasted nuts. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Peru Chuncho 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Dark Chocolate Bar Colombia Criollo 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Cru d'Exception from Latin America, this dark chocolate comes from Colombian Criollo beans. With its 75% cocoa, this dark chocolate presents soft and balanced notes. With a palette of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Venezuela Chuao 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Grand cru cocoa beans: a delicate dark chocolate of an exceptional variety, beans originating from Chuao, Venezuela The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: This rare cocoa from Northwestern Madagascar grows in the canopy of the Ottange farm under the shade of native trees. A true single-origin “grand cru”, this dark chocolate is a subtle bouquet of notes of red fruits, nuts, honey, coffee and cocoa. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Mexico Criollo & Almendra Blanca 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A true single-origin "grand cru", this chocolate from Mexico - the origin country of cocoa is made from Criollo &amp; Almendra Blanca beans of the Tacotalpa region. Nurtured by the warmth and humidity of the country, they offer an abundance of citrus and tonic notes and reveal a discreet bitterness. The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Sao Tome & Principe Amelonado 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Grand cru cocoa beans: São Tomé cacao originates from the first importations of chocolate in to Africa. This traditional pure product is from an Amelonado variety. Its distinctive features include aromas of dried fruits. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Brazil Forastero Blanco 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Grand cru: « Forastero Blanco », also known as « Catongo », carries red fruit flavours.  The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Equateur
Milk Chocolate Bar Togo 60% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Delicate and flavored, this grand cru is the first from Togo to be processed by the Manufacture's roasting chocolate craftsmen. Thanks to its high cocoa content, this bar combines the sweetness of milk chocolate with the intensity of cocoa.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Filled Bar Hazelnut Praliné & Fleur de sel 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with an old-style hazelnut praliné, with a pinch of fleur de sel to intensify the flavour.The filling is delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar... Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate Filled Bar Hazelnut Praliné & Fleur de sel 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A bar of milk chocolate filled with a traditional hazelnut praliné with a salty note of fleur de sel. The chocolate is poured in a thin layer. The filling is placed onto the poured chocolate, then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy centre. Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Filled Bar Pistachio Praliné 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with old-style crunchy praliné with pistachios. The chocolate is poured in a thin layer. The filling is delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres. Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate French Nuts & Candied Fruits 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse signe une nouvelle création aux airs républicains après l'Hexa-français. Affichant fièrement la devise française d'un côté, elle rend hommage au terroir national de l'autre. Décorée de divers fruits secs &amp; confits en provenance de l'Hexagone ou de l'Ile de Beauté.

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate French Nuts & Candied Fruits 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse imagined a new patriotic creation following the Hexa-français. Proudly displaying the french nation motto on one side, it pays tribute to the french terroir on the other.

title: Luxury Giant Milk Chocolate Bar 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The dark chocolate produced by La Manufacture is available in XXL format! This one kilo breakable block is to be savoured as it comes or to offer as an original present in a novel form. This artisanal chocolate, with its unique flavour, can also be used in the preparation of desserts.

title: Square Bites Box 30 pieces of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

title: Square Bites Box 50 pieces of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.

title: Praliné Triumph Hexagone 45% Milk Chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: With its medal-like shape, the Praliné Triumph Hexagon transports you to this french based sporting event. Containing a treasure trove of French pistachio and almond praliné, it invites you to take part in this very special moment. If you want to reach the end and win the chocolate laurels, dare to enjoy it! Whether as a gift or for yourself, this 45% Milk Chocolate creation from our Manufacture promises a tasting experience full of flavor.

title: Milk Chocolate 45% Cocoa Pods Bar | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Our Christmas Milk chocolate bar, featuring a unique blend highlighting various cocoa origins will take you back to the source of chocolate. Indulge in our chocolate bar adorned with cocoa pods, a true symbol of our foundational ingredient.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Java 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A caramelised and spicy dark chocolate beans originating from the Island of Java, Indonesia. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Bar Bolivia Wild Cocoa 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Harvested by native populations in the northern forest of Bolivia, this wild cocoa reveals a sweet smell and is characterized by a non-acidic freshness and a particularly varied palette of aromas: dried fruits, flowers and spices. The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources.

title: Praliné Triumph Hexagone 75% Dark Chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: With its medal-like shape, the Praliné Triumph Hexagon transports you to this french based sporting event. title: Dark Chocolate Filled Bar Coco Pralinée 75% | le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The coconut praliné from the Manufacture is entering the range of filled bars for the happiness of the most gourmands! This 75% Signature Blend dark chocolate bar is filled with two preparations made by our chocolate craftsmen. First a praliné with roasted coconut and almonds, then a caramel, also with coconut. The crunchiness of the praliné and the smoothness of the caramel combined to the crisp of the chocolate layers create a delicious game of textures, for a great moment of indulgence.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Filled Bar Pistachio-Flavoured Marzipan 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with pistachio-flavoured marzipan.The chocolate is poured in a thin layer. The filling is delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres. Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Filled Bar Smooth Caramel 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Coated in dark chocolate, this chocolate bar is filled with a smooth caramel that melts in the mouth and crunchy almond flakes, a blend of flavours and textures that will awaken your senses. The perfect sweet treat ! Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate Filled Bar Smooth Caramel 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse

title: Dark Chocolate 75% Little Rooster | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays homage to the famous French symbol by creating the Little Rooster. This indulgent creation is filled with sweetness, featuring a smooth blend of hazelnut and French almond praliné mixed with our dark or milk chocolate blends. Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small milk chocolate bites. Inside each of them : our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers ! Our Chocolates are best eaten within 5 weeks of purchase

title: Espresso - 15 specialty coffee capsules | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: It can be drunk long or short, but above all it thinks big: our Signature Espresso Blend in capsules (compatible with Nespresso® machines) is a journey between India and Brazil through fair, balanced aromatic paths. Taking the scenic route, it leads you to its fruity, spicy flavors and citrus and chocolate notes. A blend of great precision, thanks in particular to the two farms chosen: one committed to quality in the world's largest coffee-producing country, the other believing in a culture that welcomes what the earth gives it, without human intervention or added products.

title: The Italian - 15 specialty coffee capsules | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: When we think of Italian coffee, we think of it as intense &amp; full-bodied, a little burnt, a little bitter. And that's exactly how we wanted ours. In capsules (compatible with Nespresso® machines), its powerful yet balanced chocolate and spice notes enchant you with a "ciao" and never leave you feeling low. Consistent right down to its origins, its 100% Brazilian blend combines two varieties, 80% Catuaï and 20% Conillon, from the same farm and the same plot of land, with the aim of highlighting a single terroir.

title: The Paradox - 15 specialty decaf coffee capsules | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: Of course we've thought of you, you paradoxical spirits who want to drink coffee without drinking coffee! We're offering you the quite extraordinary experience of enjoying a smooth, singular beverage, caffeine-free, but with flavors wonderfully in line with what you'd expect from coffee, fair and balanced, with just the right amount of bitterness and acidity. These capsules (compatible with Nespresso® machines) can be prepared as an espresso for greater intensity, or as a filter for more lightness: it's time for a decaf break!

title: Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" 27 pieces Box of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Our Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" are produced ‘old fashioned-style’. These classics, with almonds and hazelnuts caramelised come in fondant and crunchy varieties. Recipes containing pistachios, peanuts or roasted coconut marry tradition and originality.  This box of 27 pieces contains 9 flavours.

title: Ganaches & Pralinés 45 pieces Box of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence... Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

To the classic recipes with almond, hazelnut, pistachio, peanut, coconut in dark or milk chocolate... are added sunflower, cocoa nibs, white &amp; black sesame flavors. A combination of tradition &amp; originality!

title: Single-Origin Ganaches Box of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The origins of the cocoa are key to discovering the Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, it is the terroir of each country or, more precisely, of each region that gives the beans their individual taste. The Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches come in 5 varieties.240 g  This box of 30 pieces contains 5 flavours. Our Chocolates are best eaten within 3 weeks of purchase

title: Flavoured Ganaches Box 21 pieces of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The Flavored Ganaches come in 11 flavours offering different textures: fondant, crunchy and crispy. Created using fresh fruit or spices, the Flavored Ganaches offer both original and creative blends. 170 g This box of 21 pieces contains 11 flavours.

title: Luxury 6 Chocolate Bars Box  | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: From the grand cru to the single-origin bar, not to mention the Mendiant and the unconched Tradition bar, this set of chocolate bars is an invitation to the sweet world of La Manufacture.6 chocolate bars: 5 dark bars, 1 milk bar

To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

title: Pépites box Milk Chocolate Praliné of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse

title: Cocorico Box Dark and Milk Chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Did you know? In Latin, the word "gallus" means both "Gaul" and "rooster"! Historically, the rooster appeared on Gaulish coins — today, it appears on our treats! In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays tribute to the French symbol and includes the word "Cocorico" inscribed on its pépites. These indulgent treats conceal a dual-praliné heart: hazelnut praline &amp; almond nib praliné for the dark chocolate version, and almond praliné &amp; hazelnut vanilla praliné for the milk chocolate. Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

title: Luxury Soveria Candied Citrus Trio | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate 75% Dragées | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

title: Croc'
description: Revisit your childhood with our Croc'. These puffed cereals are carefully coated in dark or milk chocolate, creating a crunchy texture that melts deliciously in the mouth. Our Croc' is the perfect snack or afternoon treat!

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate 45% Hazelnut Roc' Rocher | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A “Roc” is delicious and highly addictive: a blend of dried and candied fruits, puffed cereals and shavings of lace crêpes all coated in either dark or milk chocolate. Unique combinations, high-quality ingredients and an artisanal savoir-faire that results in no two Roc’s having the same shape, but all having a delicious taste that is constant!

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate 75% Almond Roc' Rocher | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A “Roc” is delicious and highly addictive: a blend of dried and candied fruits, puffed cereals and shavings of lace crêpes all coated in either dark or milk chocolate. Unique combinations, high-quality ingredients and an artisanal savoir-faire that results in no two Roc’s having the same shape, but all having a delicious taste that is constant!

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate 45% Hazelnut Dragées | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate. They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate 75% Hazelnut Dragées | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate. They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

title: Luxury Hazerlnut Chocolate Spread XL | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Deliciously regressive, spreadable chocolate...Created from an almond and hazelnut praline, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will put a smile on the faces of children and grown-ups alike. Similarly to the Manufacture’s old-fashioned pralines, the spread has a slightly granulose texture making it unique and ultra- delicious.XL size 550g

title: Luxury Hazerlnut Chocolate Spread | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A childish delight, chocolate spread... Made with caramelised almonds and hazelnuts pralines, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will delight young and old alike. Like the traditional caramelised nut praliné made by La Manufacture, this spread has a delicately crunchy texture that makes it truly original as well as truly delicious. Standard Format 250g

title: Luxury Peanut Chocolate Spread | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Our chocolate spreads are the perfect childish delight... This original recipe, made from peanuts &amp; hazelnuts pralines, dark &amp; milk chocolate, will delight young and old alike. The spread offers a meltingly soft texture that makes it truly delicious.

title: Luxury Hot Chocolate Mix | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: A taste of childhood... A comforting brew whose smell is rich with memories, perfect for breakfast or an afternoon snack. How do you make a real cup of traditional hot chocolate? Pour a little warm milk over the grated chocolate to melt it, mixing well until it is smooth. Then add more warm milk, until the desired chocolaty consistency and strength is reached. 300g

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Chocobar 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture de chocolate signature, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the chocolate bar is THE perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The "mendiant" style bar reveals a heart made with almond and hazelnut praline, slivers of pistachios, raisins and candied orange peel...

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate Chocobar 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture de chocolat signature, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The "mendiant" style bar reveals a heart made with almond and cornflake praline combined with a caramel ganache, covered in Madagascar 45% milk chocolate.

title: Luxury Dark Chocolate Sesame Chocobar 75% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture's signature, a delicious recipe in a re-sealable pouch... the chocobar is THE perfect treat to carry in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The bar reveals a heart made with black sesame and almond praline, puffed rice for the crispy, all coated in dark chocolate...

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate Bar 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate. Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

title: Luxury Milk Chocolate Bars 45% | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate. Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

title: Square Bites Box 50 pieces of luxury French chocolate | Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse
description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.

title: Espresso - Coffee beans 50% Brazil, 50% India | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: It can be drunk long or short, but above all it thinks big: our Signature Espresso Blend in beans is a journey between India and Brazil through fair, balanced aromatic paths. Taking the scenic route, this specialty coffee leads you to its fruity, spicy flavors and citrus and chocolate notes. A blend of great precision, thanks in particular to the two farms chosen: one committed to quality in the world's largest coffee-producing country, the other believing in a culture that welcomes what the earth gives it, without human intervention or added products.

title: The Italian - Coffee beans 100% Brazil | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: When we think of Italian coffee, we think of it as intense &amp; full-bodied, a little burnt, a little bitter. And that's exactly how we wanted ours. In beans, its powerful yet balanced chocolate and spice notes enchant you with a "ciao" and never leave you feeling low. Consistent right down to its origins, its 100% Brazilian blend combines two varieties, 80% Catuaï and 20% Conillon, from the same farm and the same plot of land, with the aim of highlighting a single terroir.

title: The Filter - Coffee beans 25% Ethiopia, 50% Rwanda, 25% Kenya | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: Filter coffee or philter coffee? It’s hard to tell as its smoothness goes straight to your heart! There's something magical about this elixir, if only because of its history: it takes you on a journey to Africa, the cradle of coffee. A mythical journey, from Ethiopia to Rwanda via Kenya. The roaster, too, is a bit of a magician, disappearing into the background to make room for the taste of the product and its origins. He chooses a gentle, light roasting to bring out the natural sweetness and acidity of the fruit. An ode to the raw material and the land from which it comes.

title: The Paradox - Decaf coffee beans 100% Colombia | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: Of course we've thought of you, you paradoxical spirits who want to drink coffee without drinking coffee! We're offering you the quite extraordinary experience of enjoying a smooth, singular beverage, caffeine-free, but with flavors wonderfully in line with what you'd expect from coffee, fair and balanced, with just the right amount of bitterness and acidity. And we didn't do things by halves just because you're a bit fussy. We went all the way to Colombia, and even climbed up to La Fabrica, a Colombian farm in the Tolima region. It's up there, on these high-altitude plots, draped in mist and clouds, that a community of coffee growers, comprising over 200 families, cultivates coffee with great care. Each fruit is hand-picked, cherry by cherry. And cherry on top (of the coffee), a second selection is made after harvesting, to ensure that only the very best is kept! The fruit is then fermented with natural yeasts before being dried, milled and decaffeinated. And there you have it! These beans can be prepared as an espresso for greater intensity, or as a filter for more lightness: it's time for a decaf break!

title: Ethiopia - Washed organic coffee beans 100% Ethiopia Yirgacheffe | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: Sit down at the counter and embark on a journey around the world and through history. These fine &amp; subtle notes, these citrus, apricot and jasmine flavors, this strong but controlled acidity, are the bewitching promise of a return to the roots. We're heading for Ethiopia, the cradle of coffee for centuries, to the Yirgacheffe region, which produces some of the world's best-loved coffees. No doubt the plants feel at home in their native land, in a highly favorable environment, allowing them to flourish in the best possible way. Our head roaster really fell in love with this coffee chosen from all the coffees offered by the farm we work with, and we hope you will too. It's not everyday you get invited to travel aboard a cup!

title: Colombia - Coffee beans 100% Colombia Castillo | Le Café Alain Ducasse
description: A coffee whose taste is inextricably linked to its origins. Welcome to La Fabrica, a Colombian farm in the Tolima region! It's here, on these high-altitude plots draped in mist and clouds, that a community of coffee growers comprising over 200 families cultivates Castillo, a variety that owes its unique characteristics to the country's particular climate. Here, each fruit is hand-picked, cherry by cherry. And cherry on top (of the coffee), a second selection is made after harvesting, to ensure that only the very best is kept! The fruit is then fermented with natural yeasts before being dried and milled.The result of this demanding, natural method? Full-bodied, smooth and creamy flavors, with incredible complexity and fruity notes of mirabelle plum, red berries and physalis, thanks to the cherry’s sugar absorbed by the bean during all these stages. Prepare as an espresso for greater intensity, or as a filter for greater lightness, you’re the one calling the coffee shots!
